Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: hyperventilate \hyperventilate\ v. i. to breathe rapidly and deeply; to breathe excessively; as, The mountain climber started to hyperventilate. [WordNet 1.5]
hyperventilate v 1: produce hyperventilation in; "The nurses had to hyperventilate the patient" 2: breathe excessively hard and fast; "The mountain climber started to hyperventilate"
